about_the_game:
Fantasy Gallery

This Fantasy-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Mystical Beasts, Magical scenes and Medieval Castles!

Get your imagination flowing with this dive into the Fantastical!

Contents

The Fantasy gallery unlocks the following images:
  • Griffin
  • Dragon
  • Wizard
  • Unicorn
  • Cloud Castle
  • Excalibur
  • Sea Beast
  • Archer
  • Fireball
  • Gnome House
  • Quest
  • Potion
  • Dave
  • Knight
  • Moon Tree
  • Fairytale
  • Battle
  • Dwarf Miner
  • Treasure Map
  • Cthulhu
  • Fairy

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: WooLoop - Fantasy Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: This Fantasy-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Mystical Beasts, Magical scenes and Medieval Castles! Get your imagination flowing with this dive into the Fantastical!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
